Hello! Just to inform TD Ameritrade Singapore has announced today that they will now focus only Accredited Investors. Those retail clients will have to transfer or close TD Ameritrade account before the stipulated time given by them. Here is the official announcement from their websitehttps://www.tdameritrade.com.sg/retail-clients.html
